wmaethner commented on Issue #194

Agreed, this would be nice especially for the Subscription request/verification flow, but could also show the different flows based on whether the subscription was verified (then could have notifications as well) vs if it was denied.

@isaacvetter I know we talked about adding these at one point, any idea what happened with that?

isaacvetter commented on Issue #194

Hey @wmaethner , @ajuliansr,

Yeah, we put a few flow diagrams in the (informational) Security Considerations page. How about --

Proposed resolution: Persuasive

We will clean up this diagram and place it within the actual spec.

ajuliansr commented on Issue #194

Looking forward to reviewing.

From: Isaac Vetter [mailto:notifications@github.com]
Sent: Tuesday, May 07, 2019 11:19 AM
To: HL7/fhircast-docs
Cc: Julian, Anthony J.; Mention
Subject: [EXTERNAL] Re: [HL7/fhircast-docs] May 2019 Ballot Comment: (#194)

Hey @wmaethner<https://github.com/wmaethner> , @ajuliansr<https://github.com/ajuliansr>,

Yeah, we put a few flow diagrams in the (informational) Security Considerations<https://fhircast.hl7.org/security-considerations/#http-web-hooks-using-websub> page. How about --

Proposed resolution: Persuasive

We will clean up this diagram<https://fhircast.hl7.org/security-considerations/#http-web-hooks-using-websub> and place it within the actual spec.

—
You are receiving this because you were mentioned.
Reply to this email directly, view it on GitHub<https://github.com/HL7/fhircast-docs/issues/194#issuecomment-490149315>, or mute the thread<https://github.com/notifications/unsubscribe-auth/ADSP6EZEAVURONXZKIZQPGLPUGTWZANCNFSM4HJPVTAA>.

isaacvetter commented on Issue #194:

## :telephone_receiver: CDS Working Group Vote (5-21-2019)

Meeting notes: https://confluence.hl7.org/display/IMIN/Teleconferences

@isaacvetter moved the following disposition, seconded by @NiklasSvenzen

Disposition: Persuasive
Disposition Comment: We will clean up the diagram and place it within the actual spec.

:+1: For:  9
:expressionless: Abstain: 0
:-1: Against: 0

:tada: The motion passed! :tada:
